data.title: Birmingham City live score, schedule & player stats
data.meta_description: Birmingham City live score, fixtures, player ratings and statistics.
data.text:
Birmingham City live scores, players, season schedule and today’s results are available on Sofascore.

Birmingham City next match

Birmingham City will play the next match against Charlton Athletic on Aug 13, 2024, 6:45:00 PM UTC in EFL Cup.

When the match starts, you will be able to follow Charlton Athletic vs Birmingham City live score, standings, minute by minute updated live results and match statistics.

We may have video highlights with goals and news for some Birmingham City matches, but only if they play their match in one of the most popular football leagues.

Birmingham City previous match

Birmingham City previous match was against Reading in League One, the match ended in a draw (1 - 1).

Birmingham City fixtures tab is showing the last 100 football matches with statistics and win/draw/lose icons.

There are also all Birmingham City scheduled matches that they are going to play in the future.

Birmingham City performance and form graph is a Sofascore unique algorithm that we are generating from the team's last 10 matches, statistics, detailed analysis and our own knowledge.

This graph may help predict future Birmingham City matches.

Current Birmingham City players

Forward: Tyler Roberts, Alfie May, Lukas Jutkiewicz, Ayumu Yokoyama Midfielder: Krystian Bielik, Seung-Ho Paik, Koji Miyoshi, Jordan James, Emil Hansson, Juninho Bacuna, Siriki Dembélé, Luke Harris, Willum Thor Willumsson, George Hall, Marc Leonard, Alex Cochrane, Alfie Chang, Romelle Donovan, Keshi Anderson, Brandon Khela, Josh William Home Defender: Ethan Laird, Lee Buchanan, Christoph Klarer, Dion Sanderson, Emmanuel Longelo, Josh Williams, Tom Fogarty Goalkeeper: Bailey Peacock-Farrell, Ryan Allsop, Bradley Mayo

The current Birmingham City roster, stats and player performance can be found on this page.

There are also statistics for each player in all competitions with all total played and started matches, minutes played, number of goals scored, number of cards and much more.

Birmingham City top scorers list is updated live during every match.

You can click on players from the roster above and see available personal information such as nationality, date of birth, height, preferred foot, position, player value, transfer history etc.
